title: Solo-Q Champion Select Idea
body:
Hello,

So i think we all know the struggles of solo-Q Champion Selections.
From the guy that is on his smurf and will either trol pick or afk the whole game if he doesnt get what he wants all the way to the player that is just so annoyed by the champion select trols that he lost all hope and starts troling himself. 

There is nothing i hate more like for example the szenario off my last game:
Player x joins the Champion Selection and starts off by saying: "no support, no adc, i go mid." Keep in mind player x is last pick.
All the roles are taken now and the only free role is support. Player x decides to rage and picks ezreal with smite and ignite instead off going with a support.

Even in games that do not have any trol picks, i believe that solo-Q can only reflect your skill level if you actually play the role that is your main. 
For myself for example i am Gold IV right now. However eventhough my main is mid and i can compete easily with Platin/Diamond with my mid champs, i can barely use  that skill. Simply because i get my mid pick about 1 out off 5 games. And every other off those games i get a trol that is mad for me taking mid eventhough i am going with the pickorder.

I believe this is one of the biggest and most annoying issues in Solo-Q and i believe there is a simple fix.
If every player who searches for the game would be able to select the role as which he wants to play and then the 5 fitting roles get matched up into one team, there would be no issues. Everyone would know what champs/positions to pick and would perform at their actual skill-level. 

Now i do not know if this has been suggested before, but if it has not i would really like Riot to consider this.
Also i am not sure if this is the right part off the forum for this post.
